{"step_by_step_thinking": "Golodirsen is a drug that has been approved by the FDA for the treatment of Duchenne muscular dystrophy in certain patients. It works by skipping exon 53 in the dystrophin gene, which can help produce a functional version of the dystrophin protein. This protein is missing in boys with Duchenne muscular dystrophy, leading to progressive muscle degeneration and weakness. Therefore, golodirsen can be effective in treating Duchenne muscular dystrophy.", "answer_choice": "A"}
